MSstrings is a package that will read in spectronaugt-formatted peptides with and without protein modifications and display them nicely.

# Installation

MSstrings can be installled from GitHub using the following command:

```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github('BIFX545-26/msstrings-amenarif')
```

# Example

This package comes with a sample data set, which we import and display below.

```{r}
library(Msstrings)

data("MSfrags")
parse_mods(MSfrags)
```
